metadata.name: Amana Braimah
metadata.bio: I'm a product designer with 5+ years of experience simplifying complex systems into high-adoption consumer products. often implementing my designs in production using tools like Framer and Cursor. I've led design for **Gist**, **Sperax**, and **Chaquen**, and contributed to core DeFi UX at **Vaultcraft**, building mobile, web, and emerging-platform experiences used by thousands. I also cofounded **Salypay**, a WhatsApp-based financial product that enables fast, trust-first transactions through conversational interfaces. You can reach out via **email** or send **DM** on x.

experiences.description: Led core iOS experience and Vision Pro interface design.
Redesigned DeFi staking and lending UX for a protocol managing $10.8M+ TVL.
Designed and launched a fantasy sports dApp scaling to 18k+ active users.
Designed DeFi dashboards and simplified yield strategy flows.
Designed web and mobile systems improving delivery speed by 30%.
Designed core UX for a rental marketplace across web and mobile.
